name: paw-playwright-bdd-framework

scripts.test:dev:chrome: npm run cleanup-reports && ENV=dev BROWSER=chrome npx cucumber-js --config=cucumber.js --profile=devChrome; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run generate-report; node scripts/check-test-results.js reports/cucumber_report_dev.json; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:dev:firefox: npm run cleanup-reports && ENV=dev BROWSER=firefox npx cucumber-js --config=cucumber.js --profile=devFirefox; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run generate-report; node scripts/check-test-results.js reports/cucumber_report_dev.json; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:dev:webkit: npm run cleanup-reports && ENV=dev BROWSER=webkit npx cucumber-js --config=cucumber.js --profile=devWebkit; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run generate-report; node scripts/check-test-results.js reports/cucumber_report_dev.json; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:test:chrome: npm run cleanup-reports && ENV=test BROWSER=chrome npx cucumber-js --config=cucumber.js --profile=testChrome; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run generate-report; node scripts/check-test-results.js reports/cucumber_report_test.json; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:test:firefox: npm run cleanup-reports && ENV=test BROWSER=firefox npx cucumber-js --config=cucumber.js --profile=testFirefox; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run generate-report; node scripts/check-test-results.js reports/cucumber_report_test.json; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:test:webkit: npm run cleanup-reports && ENV=test BROWSER=webkit npx cucumber-js --config=cucumber.js --profile=testWebkit; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run generate-report; node scripts/check-test-results.js reports/cucumber_report_test.json; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:prod:chrome: npm run cleanup-reports && ENV=prod BROWSER=chrome npx cucumber-js --config=cucumber.js --profile=prodChrome; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run generate-report; node scripts/check-test-results.js reports/cucumber_report_prod.json; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:prod:firefox: npm run cleanup-reports && ENV=prod BROWSER=firefox npx cucumber-js --config=cucumber.js --profile=prodFirefox; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run generate-report; node scripts/check-test-results.js reports/cucumber_report_prod.json; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE
scripts.test:prod:webkit: npm run cleanup-reports && ENV=prod BROWSER=webkit npx cucumber-js --config=cucumber.js --profile=prodWebkit; TEST_EXIT_CODE=$?; npm run generate-report; node scripts/check-test-results.js reports/cucumber_report_prod.json; exit $TEST_EXIT_CODE

author: Sunny Kumar
description: Playwright BDD framework using Cucumber with POM structure and environment-specific test data.
